title: Toronto & Type
content: I will be in Toronto in 2 months or so & I was wondering if there is anything there I should go out of my way to check out while I am there. With special emphasis on typography of course! Thanks!
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
[Type Club of Toronto](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Type%20Club%20of%20Toronto)

Also, look up [Nick Shinn](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Nick%20Shinn), and if you have a couple hours to come down to Buffalo, look us up at [P22](http://web.archive.org/wiki/P22).

I won’t be able to resist an offer like that! I’ll write you privately to see when & if I can come visit. Nick, are you in Toronto? For some reason I thought you moved to the UK. Was I dreaming? Was it temporary?
Ah, toronto. I’m a ‘few’ hours north of there.
